summary: Request to expose the raw gRPC OperatorService client in the PHP SDK without requiring a high-level API wrapper.
userImpact: Users can directly access gRPC OperatorService functionality without waiting for high-level SDK abstractions.
proposedFix: Expose the compiled gRPC OperatorServiceClient code available at api/v1/Temporal/Api/Operatorservice/V1/OperatorServiceClient.php
resolutionDetails: The raw gRPC OperatorService client was exposed in the SDK, allowing direct access to the compiled gRPC code.
keyQuote: No need for a high level API, just expose the compile grpc code
